abstract: Turkish government threatens to shut down Twitter unless it blocks account of BirGun, left-wing newspaper that circulated documents about military police raid on Turkish Intelligence Agency trucks traveling to Syria in January 2014; coverage of investigation is banned for violating national security.
lead_paragraph: The government wanted Twitter to prevent a left-wing newspaper from circulating accounts of a raid by the military police.

byline.contributor: Vindu Goel contributed reporting from San Francisco.

snippet: The government wanted Twitter to prevent a left-wing newspaper from circulating accounts of a raid by the military police.

headline.main: Turkey Threatens to Block Social Media Over Released Documents
headline.print_headline: Turkey Threatens to Block Social Media Over Released Documents
